src:
KRAJ: Partizan - Vojvodina 4:0 (VIDEO)
Iz minuta u minut pratite dešavanja iz Humske...

02 Nov 2019



SUPERLIGA SRBIJE, 15. KOLO



PARTIZAN – VOJVODINA 4:0/Natho 29pen, Natho 43, Zdjelar 48, Sadik 69/


BeogradStadion PartizanaSudija: Miloš Đorđić

Partizan: Stojković – Miletić, Ostojić, Pavlović, Urošević – Zdjelar, Šćekić (od 77. L. Pavlović) – F. Stevanović, Natho (od 59. Suma), Asano – Sadik (od 74. Ivanović). Rezerve: N. Stevanović, Brežančić, Lutovac, Tošić, L. Pavlović, Suma, Ivanović. Trener: Savo Milošević.
Vojvodina: Rockov – Veselinović, Đurić, Saničanin, Devetak – Drinčić, Đurišić (od 61. Topić) – Đuričin, Bojić, Eze (od 61. Gemović) – Matić (od 61. Nikolić). Rezerve: Toroman, Topić, Zukić, Petković, Nikolić, Gemović, Stojković. Trener: Nenad Lalatović.



*** KLAĐENJE UŽIVO ***



Vesti uživo
15:44
Kraj utakmice!
Nema više vremena, nema ni nadoknade... Partizan je dobio Vojvodinu u derbiju sa 4:0. 
15:39
Manje od 10 minuta do kraja meča, sve je ovde odavno rešeno...
15:35
Evo Lazara Pavlovića
Van igre ide Aleksandar Šćekić.
15:34
Lazar Pavlović je spreman da uđe...
15:32
I Sadik ide napolje
Umesto njega šansu dobija Đorđe Ivanović.
15:31
74. minut
Sadik tuče sa oko 25 metara, preko gola...
15:29
GOOL - 4:0!
69. minut - Još jedan gol crno-belih i definitivno rešene sve dileme oko pobednika, ako ih je uopšte i bilo... Posle dve asistencije upisao se Umar sadik. Lepa solo akcija, dobar šut i pogodak...



 
15:25
A evo i Zdjelarove bombe...



 
15:24
Trostruku izmenu pravi Lalatović u 61. minutu
Izašli su Đurišić, Eze i Matić, šansu su dobili Nikolić, Gemović i Topić.
15:23
59. minut
Očekivano, van igre ide Natho, ušao je Suma.
15:15
STATIVA!
58. minut - Najbolja šansa za Vojvodinu! Ognjen Đuričin bolju priliku verovatno neće imati. Ozbiljnu grešku napravio je Vladimir Stojković, izleteo u prazno, Đurič ga obišao, međutim nije uspeo da pogodi praznu mrežu. Bio je doduše iskosa... Ali nema opravdanja, mofao je i matića da posluži, to bi bilo bolje rešenje.
15:14
Imajući u vidu rezultat ne treba da čudi ukoliko se savo Milošević rano odluči da iz igre povuče neke od glavnih igrača, kako bi ih sačuvao za utakmicu Lige Evrope u Mančester Junajtedu...
15:13
Suma se zagreva, izgleda da će on prvi u igru...
15:10
Ima još mnogo da se igra, čitavo drugo poluvreme, međutim teško će se Vojvodina oporaviti od ovogvog starta u nastavku...
15:08
GOOOLL!
48. minut - Sjajan početak drugog poluvremena! Vrlo lep gol Saše Zdjelara na asistenciju Sadika... Lepo je napadač crno-belih odložio loptu za svog vezistu, a ovaj snažnim udarcem "pocepao" mrežu Emila Rockova. Jedan od lepših pogodaka ove sezone, nema sumnje.
15:01
Počelo je drugo poluvreme!
Za sada nema izmena...
14:47
Kraj prvog poluvremena!
Nije bilo nadoknade, sudija Miloš Đorđić svira kraj po isteku 45. minuta. Partizan ima prednost od dva gola i sigurno gazi ka pobedi u ovom derbiju protiv Vojvodine. Osim nekoliko dobrih istračavanja po bokovima i onog pokušaja drinčića iz kornera, Novosađani nisu ozbiljno zapretili. Desetak minuta pauze, pa nastavljamo praćenje prvog meča subotnjeg programa Superlige...






 
14:46
GOOL!
43. minut - Partizan zasluženo stiže do drugog gola! Natho je strelac, ali najveći deo posla obavio je Umar sadik, koji je sjajno okrenuo Saničanina, pa poslužio kao na tacni Izraelca, kome nije bilo teško da pogodi nebranjenu mrežu sa oko 15 metara...
14:39
40. minut
Dobar pokušaj Sadika! Dugo se gradio napadač Partizana, tražio pravu poziciju da opali, na kraju je to učinio, bilo je dosta iskosa i Rockov je uhavtio loptu. 
14:38
Prilično čudna atmosfera u Humskoj, nijedna od frakcija ne navija...
14:34
Vojvodina nešto agilnija posle primljenog gola, pokušava da dođe do izjednačenja, Partizan se malo povukao...
14:33
GOOL!
29. minut - Siguran je Bibras Natho sa bele tačke, Rockov nije pogodio stranu.
14:30
PENAL ZA PARTIZAN!

Posle gužve u šesnaestercu i mnogo povlačenja (Devetak - Ostojić), sudija Đorđić pokazao je na belu tačku. Nije se najjasnije videlo o čemu se radi...

14:24
Sadik pada pred šesnaestercem Vojvodine, nema faula
25. minut - Mnogo bure u Humskoj! Sadik je išao sam na gol, bila bi to situacija jedan na jedan, sve posle grube greške defanzivaca Vojvodine, a onda je Marko Đurišić startovao s leđa, međutim arbitar je pokazao da se igra nastavi. Da je dosudio prekršaj bio bi to i crveni karton verovatno, pošto štoper Novosađana ima žuti karton. Skočila je cela klupa crno-belih, burni protesti... 
14:20
Bližimo se polovini prvog dela meča, za sada bez ozbiljnih šansi. Partizan dva udarca u okvir gola, Voša osim pokušaja Drinčića iz kornera nije zapretila...
14:19
18. minut
Iznenada se ukazala šansa Nemanji Miletiću, bek Partizana se našao u šesnaestercu, ali sporo je reagovao i gostujući defanzivci su reagovali... 
14:13
17. minut
Zanimljiv pokušaj Nikole Drinčića, gađao je iz kornera direktno u gol, međutim Stojković oprezan...
14:11
12. minut
Iz slobodnog udaraca probao je Filip Stevanović, ali lopta nije stigla do Rockova, izblokiran je taj udarac...
14:08
Nervozni su crno-beli na startu utakmice, dosta prigovaraju sudiji Đorđiću...
14:07
5. minut
Prvi pokušaj crno-belih, tukao je Takuma Asano sa oko 20 metara, dobra odbrana Roskova.
14:03
Dosta dobar ritam u uvodnim minutima, Vojvodina se neće braniti, to je jasno već sada...
14:01
Utakmica je počela!
13:55
Igrači izlaze na teren, uskoro očekujemo početak meča...
13:40
Stadion praznjikav
Manje od deset minuta do početka meča, stadion u Humskoj praznjikav. jak vetar u dobroj meri doprineo je lošoj poseti...
13:30
Vojvodina najčešće sapliće večite
Pisali smo pre dva dana o statistici koja kaže da Vojvodina najviše bodova otkida Partizanu i Crvenoj zvezdi. Imajući to u obzir crno-bele čeka vrlo težak posao, pogotovo ako se zna da je novosadska Stara dama ove sezone najbolji gost Superlige. 
13:03
ŠTA KAŽU KVOTE...
Uprkos tome što je pretrpeo tri poraza na minula četiri prvenstvena susreta Partizan se tretira kao blagi favorit u derbiju kola. Kvota na pobedu crno-belih u Kladionici MOZZART je 1,60, remi plaća 3,80, dok eventualna pobeda Vojvodine svaki ulog množi sa 6,00.
Sve kvote Kladionice MOZZART za ovaj duel pogledajte OVDE
13:03
KO JE NA KLUPI...
Poznato je i ko čeka šansu sa klupe.
Rezerve Partizana: N. Stevanović, Brežančić, Lutovac, Tošić, L. Pavlović, Suma, Ivanović.
Rezerve Vojvodine: Toroman, Topić, Zukić, Petković, Nikolić, Gemović, Stojković.
12:56
NE IGRA NIKOLIĆ, MATIĆ VODI NAPAD VOJVODINE
Što se tiče Vojvodine, najbitniju promenu u odnosu na duel vanredne runde sa Inđijom trener Nenad Lalatović napravio je u špicu. Nema u prvih 11 strelca odlučujućeg gola na tom meču, Nemanje Nikolića, umesto pozajmljenog Partizanovog špica počeće Bojan Matić, a zanimljivo je da je u odnosu na najavljeni sastav šansu umesto Mirka Topića dobio na mestu zadnjeg veznog Marko Đurišić.
Sastav Vojvodine: Rockov – Veselinović, Đurić, Saničanin, Devetak – Drinčić, Đurišić – Đuričin, Bojić, Eze – Matić.
12:51
MILOŠEVIĆ NAPRAVIO DVE PROMENE
Poznati su sastavi timova. Kad je reč o Partizanu, Savo Milošević je napravio dve izmena u odnosu na sastav koji je pre tri dana poražan na Banovom brdu od Čukaričkog. Na klupu su se preselili Sejduba Suma i Zoran Tošić, a priliku u prvih 11 dobili su Aleksandar Šćekić – što znači da će Bibras Natho biti organizator igre umesto Gvinejca – i mlađani Filip Stevanović.
Ekipa Partizana: Stojković – Miletić, Ostojić, Pavlović, Urošević – Zdjelar, Šćekić – F. Stevanović, Natho, Asano – Sadik.
12:49
Poštovani posetioci portala MOZZART Sport, dobar dan i dobrodošli na još jedno druženje. Za početak pratimo derbi 15. kola Superlige Srbije, u kome se na stadionu u Humskoj sastaju Partizan i Vojvodina.
text:
END: Partizan - Vojvodina 4: 0 (VIDEO)
Minute by minute follow the events of Hum ...

02 Nov 2019



SERBIA SUPERLIG, ROUND 15



PARTIZAN - VOJVODINA 4: 0 / Natho 29pen, Natho 43, Zdjelar 48, Sadik 69 /


BelgradePartizana Stadium Judge: Milos Djordjic

Partizan: Stojkovic - Miletic, Ostojic, Pavlovic, Urosevic - Zdjelar, Scekic (from 77 L. Pavlovic) - F. Stevanovic, Natho (from 59th Sum), Asano - Sadik (from 74. Ivanovic). Reservations: N. Stevanovic, Brezancic, Lutovac, Tosic, L. Pavlovic, Suma, Ivanovic. Coach: Savo Milosevic.
Vojvodina: Rockov - Veselinovic, Djuric, Sanicanin, Devetak - Drincic, Djurisic (from 61. Topic) - Djuricin, Bojic, Eze (from 61. Gemovic) - Matic (from 61. Nikolic). Reserves: Toroman, Topic, Zukic, Petkovic, Nikolic, Gemovic, Stojkovic. Coach: Nenad Lalatovic.



*** LIVE BETS ***



Live news
15:44
End of the game!
No more time, no compensation ... Partizan won Vojvodina in a 4-0 derby.
15:39
Less than 10 minutes left until the end of the match, everything is settled here long ago ...
15:35
Here is Lazar Pavlovic
Out of the game goes Aleksandar Scekic.
15:34
Lazar Pavlovic is ready to enter ...
15:32
And Sadik is going out
Instead, a chance is given to Djordje Ivanovic.
15:31
74th minute
Sadik beats from about 25 meters across, naked ...
15:29
GOOL - 4-0!
69th minute - Another goal of the black and whites and definitely resolved all the dilemmas about the winner, if any ... Umar sadik scored after two assists. Nice solo action, good shot and shot ...




15:25
And here's the Zdelar bomb ...




15:24
Lalatovic made a triple substitution in the 61st minute
Djurisic, Eze and Matic came out, and Nikolic, Gemovic and Topic got the chance.
15:23
59th minute
As expected, out of the game goes Natho, Suma came in.
15:15
STATIVA!
58th minute - The best chance for Vojvodina! Fiery Djuricin probably won't have a better chance. A serious mistake was made by Vladimir Stojkovic, who went out in the blank, Djuric went around, but failed to hit the empty net. He was a temptation ... But there is no excuse, he could have served his mother, that would be a better solution.
15:14
Given the result, it should be no surprise if Milosevic early on decides to withdraw some of the main players from the game in order to preserve them for the Europa League game at Manchester United ...
15:13
The sum is heating up, it looks like he will be the first to play ...
15:10
There is much more to play, the entire second half, however, it will be difficult for Vojvodina to recover from this start below ...
15:08
GOOOLL!
48th minute - Great start to the second half! A very nice goal by Sasha Zdjelar for Sadik's assist ... Nice black and white striker put the ball away for his midfielder, and this powerful punch knocked Emil Rock's net. One of the nicer hits this season, no doubt.
15:01
Second Half Started!
No changes for now ...
14:47
End of first half!
There was no compensation, referee Milos Djordjic playing the end after 45 minutes. Partizan have a two-goal advantage and are certainly striving to win this derby against Vojvodina. Apart from a few good side-by-side investigations and the attempted corner kick, the Novi Sad did not seriously threaten. A ten-minute break, so we continue to monitor Saturday's first Superliga match ...







14:46
GOOL!
43rd minute - Partizan deserves a second goal! Natho is the shooter, but most of the work was done by Umar sadik, who turned Sanicanin brilliantly and served as a tray for the Israelite, who did not find it difficult to hit the unprotected net from about 15 meters ...
14:39
40th minute
Good try Sadik! The Partizan striker was building for a long time, looking for the right position to fire, in the end he did, there was plenty of skew and Rockov caught the ball.
14:38
Pretty weird atmosphere in Hum, none of the factions cheering ...
14:34
Vojvodina slightly more agile after receiving the goal, trying to reach the equalizer, Partizan retreated a little ...
14:33
GOOL!
29th minute - Bibras Natho's safe from the white spot, Rockov didn't hit the side.
14:30
PARTIZAN PENAL!

After a crowded penalty and a lot of draws (Devetak - Ostojic), Judge Djordjic pointed to the white spot. It didn't most clearly saw what it was about ...

14:24
Sadik falls in front of Vojvodina sixteen, no fouls
25th minute - Many storms in Humska! Sadik went on his own goal, it would be a one-on-one situation, all after a rough mistake by the Vojvodina defenders, and then Marko Djurisic started from the back, however the referee showed that the game continued. Had he been awarded a foul it would have been a red card probably, since the Novosadjan stopper has a yellow card. A whole bench of black and white jumped in, violent protests ...
14:20
We are nearing the first half of the match, with no serious chances so far. Partisan two shots into the goal frame, Voša, except Drinčić's corner kick, did not threaten ...
14:19
18 minutes
Suddenly Nemanja Miletic's chance came, Partizan's back was found in the penalty area, but he was slow to react and the visiting defenders reacted ...
14:13
17 minutes
An interesting attempt by Nikola Drincic, he shot from the corner straight into the goal, but Stojkovic was careful ...
14:11
12 minutes
Filip Stevanovic tried a free kick but the ball didn't reach the Rocks, the shot was blocked ...
14:08
They are nervous black and whites at the start of the match, complaining a lot about referee Djordjic ...
14:07
5 minutes
The first black-and-white attempt was beaten by Takuma Asano from about 20 yards out, a good defense of Roscoe.
14:03
A pretty good rhythm in the opening minutes, Vojvodina will not defend itself, it is clear already ...
14:01
The match has begun!
13:55
The players are leaving the field, we expect the match to start soon ...
13:40
The stadium is vacant
Less than ten minutes before the start of the match, the stadium in Hum is festive. strong wind contributed to bad visit ...
13:30
The Duchess most often saplings forever
We wrote two days ago about statistics that say that Vojvodina scores the most points for Partizan and Red Star. With that in mind, black and white is a very difficult job, especially if one knows that the Old Lady of Novi Sad is the best guest of the Superliga this season.
13:03
WHAT DO THE QUOTES SAY ...
Despite having suffered three defeats in the past four championship matches, Partizan is treated as a slight favorite in the derby. The odds on winning black and whites at the MOZZART Bookmaker are 1.60, the draw pays 3.80, while the eventual win of Vojvodina multiplies each stake by 6.00.
See all the MOZZART Bookie odds for this duel HERE
13:03
WHO'S ON THE CLUB ...
Who is waiting for a chance off the bench is also known.
Partizan Reserves: N. Stevanovic, Brezancic, Lutovac, Tosic, L. Pavlovic, Suma, Ivanovic.
Vojvodina Reserves: Toroman, Topic, Zukic, Petkovic, Nikolic, Gemovic, Stojkovic.
12:56
DON'T PLAY NIKOLIC, MATIC LEADS ATTACK OF VOJVODINA
As for Vojvodina, coach Nenad Lalatovic made the most significant change in the extraordinary round with Indjija. Nemanja Nikolic is not in the top 11 scorers in that match, instead of loaned Partizan point guard Bojan Matic will start, and it is interesting that he got a chance to replace Marko Djurisic instead of Mirko Topic in the announced lineup.
The composition of Vojvodina: Rockov - Veselinovic, Djuric, Sanicanin, Devetak - Drincic, Djurisic - Djuricin, Bojic, Eze - Matic.
12:51
MILOSEVIC MAKES TWO CHANGES
The composition of the teams is known. When it comes to Partizan, Savo Milosevic made two changes to the squad that was defeated on Banovo Brdo by Cukaricki three days ago. Sejduba Suma and Zoran Tosic moved to the bench, with Aleksandar Scekic in the top 11 - meaning Bibras Natho would be the organizer of the game instead of Guinea - and junior Filip Stevanovic.
Partizan team: Stojkovic - Miletic, Ostojic, Pavlovic, Urosevic - Zdjelar, Scekic - F. Stevanovic, Natho, Asano - Sadik.
12:49
Dear visitors of MOZZART Sport, good afternoon and welcome to another gathering. For starters, we follow the derby of the 15th round of the Serbian Superliga, where Partizan and Vojvodina meet at the stadium in Hum.
